original: Lindh, Ernst, direktör, fd. konsul, Kalmar, f. 29/1/93 i Ystad. G. m. Anna Elisabeth Larsso^n. Barn: Sten, attaché v. sv. beskickn. i Washington, Ulf, jur. stud., Sthlm, Björn, Birgitta, g. m. civ:ekonom R. Bruun, Margaretha, Marianne. — Hand:stud., uti. res. o. prakt. Verkst. dir. i A-B Kalmar Nya Tapetfabr. sed. 21. Ordf. i dess styr. o. i styr. f. Sydöstra Sv :es engr:- o. fabr:fören. o. Sv. tapetfabr. fören., led. av styr. f. Skand. Bankens avd :kont. i Kalmar, ordf. i styr. f. A-B Kalmar Pantbank, led. av Smål.-Blek, hand:kamm. Spansk v. konsul 28-34, tysk konsul 40-45.
translated: Lindh, Ernst, director, former consul, Kalmar, b. 29/1/93 in Ystad. m. Anna Elisabeth Larsso^ n. Children: Sten, attaché v. Swedish embassy in Washington, Ulf, law student, Stockholm, Björn, Birgitta, m. c. economist R. Bruun, Margaretha, Marianne. — Hand: stud., foreign travel and practical experience. Executive director at A-B Kalmar Nya Tapetfabr. since 1921. Chairman of its board and the board of the Southeastern Swedish Engineering and Factory Association, and the Swedish Wallpaper Association. Member of the board of Skand. Bank's branch office in Kalmar, chairman of the board for A-B Kalmar Pawnshop. Member of the Smål.-Blek, Hand: Chamber. Spanish honorary consul 1928-1934, German consul 1940-1945.

memberOf.name: Southeastern Swedish Engineering and Factory Association
